programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep31
programme.desc: Snow Day / Guy Misses Out - It only snows one day a year in Troll Village, and Poppy, Branch, and Smidge want to make the most of it. Poppy tries to finally get in a hit in her annual snowball fight with Peppy; Branch is determined to make up for the snow days he missed while in his bunker; Smidge tries to get first place in all of the Snow Day competitions./While waiting for the perfect time to make his big entrance at a party, Guy misses the formation of an inside joke. The Snack Pack tells him “he just had to be there,” but Guy sets out to understand the joke and get in on the laughter.

programme.title: The Mr. Peabody And Sherman Show Ep18
programme.desc: Sherman From A To Zzzz/Akashi Shiganosuke - When Sherman hasn't slept in days because of a recurring nightmare, he causes mayhem on the set and Peabody must help Sherman confront his fears

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep18
programme.desc: Lucky And The Shaky Day - When an earthquake takes out the railroad bridge, the PALs must find a way to stop the oncoming train – which Jim is aboard

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep31
programme.desc: Love Gauntlet - King Julien tries to get rid of his parents, but when evil Karl traps them in the Love Gauntlet they must prove their family's strength to survive.

programme.title: Voltron: Legendary Defender Ep18
programme.desc: Eye Of The Storm - Team Voltron seeks to rest and recharge on the surface of an ice planet

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep18
programme.desc: What Screams May Come / Grunt Anything - Eep joins the Scream-Leading team and starts picking up characteristics of her coach, Meep, much to Ugga's chagrin/Meep kicks Snoot out of the cave for not being a brave hunter. The Croods reluctantly take Snoot in and try to make him into a hunter to get him out of their home.

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh! Ep22
programme.desc: Dang You Saved My Life / Boovsland Noir - Sharzod hates feeling indebted to Tip after being rescued and tries to get "even"; Police King Kyle must solve the case of Sharzod's missing mojo.

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh! Ep23
programme.desc: Nuttypunny / Jealohsy - When Tip can't win at the Boov game of Nuttypunny, her identity is challenged; Oh tries to win back Krunkle's affection with misguided help from Tip.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep8
programme.desc: Surf N Turf / Hardcase Returns - The snails' relaxing day at the beach is threatened when the sewer surfing roaches challenge them to a surfing contest. // Hardcase returns and threatens to take revenge on, so the crew becomes his bodyguards and takes the job a little too seriously.

programme.title: Archibald's Next Big Thing Is Here! Ep29
programme.desc: The Fluffberg Method / Singing Tele-Grammers - When Dr. Fluffberg is outed as not being a real doctor, Archibald must help him through medical school where students are put through the trials of a simulated hospital. / Archibald dons the mantle of a singing telegrammer but runs into trouble when he loses the official “Grammer” songbook.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep12
programme.desc: Hang in There, Baby - When Mega Fat CEO Baby claims he has dirt that could get Boss Baby fired, Boss Baby and the team try to find a way to get it first!

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep15
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Frantic Fury of the Fearsome Furculees - Tired of the Melvins ruling the school, the boys realize that they need Mr. Krupp to make the school at least bearable. Unfortunately, Krupp has run off to Ecuador to look for a fabled fountain. So the boys form the M.I.S.F.A.R.T.S. - Mega Incredible Search Force Adventure Rescue Team Squad - to travel to Ecuador and bring Krupp back, whether he wants it or not.

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge Ep60
programme.desc: The Wings Of War Part 1 - Hiccup and the riders are on the run from the Flyers, but when they return to Berk, where Stoick is preparing for war, Hiccup is torn between his desire to get the Edge back and his unwillingness to fire on dragons

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep60
programme.desc: Swine And Roses - It's Lord Crispintine's Day, and Toby is set on Cleevil as his Crispintine, but after a gang of imps from the portal teach Toby to be a real “bad boy,” he learns of their true plans

programme.title: All Hail King Julien: Exiled Ep60
programme.desc: Fauxsa Unchained - King Julien and Maurice infiltrate a Foosa gladiator school; Sage and Clover must face their enemies; Mort decides he must form his own army

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep8
programme.desc: Eye'll Be Watching You / Sorry Not Sorry - Convinced Troll Village is dangerous Branch makes a security plantPoppy creates an apology monster out of Gristle when teaching him how to make amends.

programme.title: Dinotrux Supercharged Ep60
programme.desc: Doom Run - The team travels to the Wastelands not the Dooms. They meet the Speed Trux who convinces the team to participate in the Doom Run race to try and win the part they need to fix Skya.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep8
programme.desc: Bad Egg - Magnus hatches a plan to hide in an egg to spy on the Rescue Riders. But things get all scrambled when a mama dragon takes him to her nest.

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service Ep15
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Bouncing Bulb - Pat's Special Delivery is a very large, very fragile lighthouse bulb, and everything seems to be conspiring to make him break it! Falling timber, an out of control sofa, Bonnie the dog, high winds...! Pat's journey from the sorting office to Pencaster Bay is a minefield of hazards. Waiting for the bulb is lighthouse keeper Chris Beacon and his pet parrot Micawber, both anxious to get the lighthouse working before sundown, and tracking a storm blowing in. Out at sea are Alf and PC Selby, enjoying a day's fishing, until they drift off-course and need the lighthouse to guide them ashore...

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service Ep16
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Lost Pigeon - The Thompson's family pigeon, Cedric, has been reported found in Northern Ireland. Pat must take Dorothy and Bill to help bring him back in the SDS Plane. Meanwhile Alf camps out at the sorting office, pining for his beloved Cedric's return. Once in Ireland, Pat meets the man who found Cedric and Dorothy manages to charm him down from his roof. Unfortunately an inopportune phone call from Alf startles cedric and causes him to take up a roost on a cliff face with a friendly puffin. With Alf causing chaos trying "help" Ben tidy up the Sorting office in Pencaster, Pat exercises his climbing skills to retrieve Cedric but it takes a brave abseil from Dorothy and Sean to finally lure the wayward bird back to its rightful owners.

programme.title: Olivia Ep19
programme.desc: Olivia Leads A Parade - As Mother tries to get baby William to sleep, Olivia, Ian and Julian create a backyard parade. When Francine finds out, she decides she's going to make her OWN parade. Olivia eventually sees that two parades can be better than one –and even figures out how to keep fussy William asleep.

programme.title: Olivia Ep20
programme.desc: Olivia Tends To The Sick - Julian comes down with a case of “itchyfootitis,” so it's Dr. Olivia to the rescue, with all kinds of silly treatments. When the “condition” begins to spread to others, Olivia imagines herself running an entire “itchy foot” clinic, and eventually discovers the perfect cure.

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep15
programme.desc: Funny Business - Big Chris receives a mysterious parcel… the cars are intrigued to find out what is in it. Strange and silly things start happening at the workshop, could it have anything to do with Big Chris' package?

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep16
programme.desc: Nick Solves The Case - PC Pete has been summonsed to get to the bottom of some missing fuel. But where's Nick? And who can solve the case?

programme.title: Archibald's Next Big Thing Is Here! Ep29
programme.desc: The Fluffberg Method / Singing Tele-Grammers - When Dr. Fluffberg is outed as not being a real doctor, Archibald must help him through medical school where students are put through the trials of a simulated hospital. / Archibald dons the mantle of a singing telegrammer but runs into trouble when he loses the official “Grammer” songbook.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep10
programme.desc: Night Of The Living Croods / Spoonful Of Soo-Gar - When The Croods experience the first-ever sugar-rush, they're hooked on the delicious new food; Grug is labeled a zombie after taking the first nap.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free: Riding Academy Ep63
programme.desc: The Neighs Have It - The PALs run into their old rivals the BUDs on the first day of classes, prompting Lucky to run for class rep. Elsewhere, Abigail helps solve a mystery.

programme.title: Harvey Girls Forever! Ep8
programme.desc: A Matter of Life and BFF / Cheer and Present Danger - After her friendship bracelet breaks, Lotta does everything she can to keep her friends. With the holidays months away the girls create their own- Friendship Appreciation Day!

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep8
programme.desc: Surf N Turf / Hardcase Returns - The snails' relaxing day at the beach is threatened when the sewer surfing roaches challenge them to a surfing contest. // Hardcase returns and threatens to take revenge on, so the crew becomes his bodyguards and takes the job a little too seriously.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep8
programme.desc: Bad Egg - Magnus hatches a plan to hide in an egg to spy on the Rescue Riders. But things get all scrambled when a mama dragon takes him to her nest.

programme.title: Archibald's Next Big Thing Is Here! Ep29
programme.desc: The Fluffberg Method / Singing Tele-Grammers - When Dr. Fluffberg is outed as not being a real doctor, Archibald must help him through medical school where students are put through the trials of a simulated hospital. / Archibald dons the mantle of a singing telegrammer but runs into trouble when he loses the official “Grammer” songbook.

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh! Ep8
programme.desc: Wrinkly Humans People / Piggy Piggy - Tip doesn't think her grandparents will approve of Oh so he disguises himself as a humans housekeeper/Sharzod adopts Pig and names him “Juicy Booty.”

programme.title: All Hail King Julien: Exiled Ep60
programme.desc: Fauxsa Unchained - King Julien and Maurice infiltrate a Foosa gladiator school; Sage and Clover must face their enemies; Mort decides he must form his own army

programme.title: Where's Wally? Ep20
programme.desc: A Wanderer's Christmas - Odlulu wants to get off the naughty list so she goes around the world and tries to "help" celebrations. Unfortunately she does the opposite which means Waldo and Wenda need to clean up her mess to reinstate Christmas!

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep8
programme.desc: Eye'll Be Watching You / Sorry Not Sorry - Convinced Troll Village is dangerous Branch makes a security plantPoppy creates an apology monster out of Gristle when teaching him how to make amends.

programme.title: The Mighty Ones Ep5
programme.desc: Creepy Caterpillar/Code of Silence - When Twig introduces Leaf to his new caterpillar friend Josh, Leaf must overcome his debilitating fear of caterpillars in order to give Josh a chance. / Hot tempered Rabbit is sick of the noise from the Mighty Ones’ games, so he makes them a bet that they can’t go for a whole day without making a sound. Desperate to see them fail, Rabbit spends the entire day making secret attempts to get the Mighty Ones to talk.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep12
programme.desc: Hang in There, Baby - When Mega Fat CEO Baby claims he has dirt that could get Boss Baby fired, Boss Baby and the team try to find a way to get it first!

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep15
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Frantic Fury of the Fearsome Furculees - Tired of the Melvins ruling the school, the boys realize that they need Mr. Krupp to make the school at least bearable. Unfortunately, Krupp has run off to Ecuador to look for a fabled fountain. So the boys form the M.I.S.F.A.R.T.S. - Mega Incredible Search Force Adventure Rescue Team Squad - to travel to Ecuador and bring Krupp back, whether he wants it or not.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep60
programme.desc: Swine And Roses - It's Lord Crispintine's Day, and Toby is set on Cleevil as his Crispintine, but after a gang of imps from the portal teach Toby to be a real “bad boy,” he learns of their true plans

programme.title: The Adventures Of Rocky And Bullwinkle Ep8
programme.desc: The Dark Side of the Moose: Chapter Three - A super-powered Rocky almost defeats Fearless Leader, but accidentally overdoes it, driving Fearless Leader to take his powers into space for the ultimate space take-over-the-world evil plan

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge Ep60
programme.desc: The Wings Of War Part 1 - Hiccup and the riders are on the run from the Flyers, but when they return to Berk, where Stoick is preparing for war, Hiccup is torn between his desire to get the Edge back and his unwillingness to fire on dragons

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep32
programme.desc: Scrap to the Future / Bringing Up Birdy - As she’s preparing for the Hearts & Crafts Festival, Poppy finds a mysterious scrapbook that seems to predict the future – and it shows the festival being a disaster! She and Branch set out to prevent the predictions from coming true. But is there a downside to being over prepared?/When a nest full of just-hatched baby birds imprint on Branch, he must overcome his fear of birds in order to raise them right.

programme.title: The Mr. Peabody And Sherman Show Ep19
programme.desc: Orchoptitron In Love/John Harrington - When Orchoptitron breaks up with his love - the toaster oven - Peabody and Sherman take it upon themselves to cheer him up by playing The Data Game

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep19
programme.desc: Lucky And The Golden Opportunity - When the PALs find gold, things spiral out of control until Lucky and Spirit have to rescue their friends from the bottom of a mine!

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep32
programme.desc: The Jungle Games - After making a bet against Uncle King Julien, King Julien must win the "Jungle Games" in order to maintain control of the royal crown.

programme.title: Voltron: Legendary Defender Ep19
programme.desc: The Ark Of Taujee - The team sets off to rescue the people of the dying lava planet of Tajueer

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep19
programme.desc: There Will Be Eggs / I Think We're Alone Meow - Eep & Thunk want to be in on the new fad of Slateboarding, but must find something to trade with (eggs). Bud and Crud try to corner the egg market/Gran takes in a group of crabby tabbies, and uses their combined crabbiness to get whatever she wants. Grug and Ugga try to get into Snoot's food-sharing party.

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh! Ep24
programme.desc: Breakers / A Day Without Tech - To save their family vacation, the Tucci's must “out-party” the hard-partying Breakers; When Boov-tech stops working, Oh goes off the grid.

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh! Ep25
programme.desc: Sacks O' Cash / Oh Give Me A Home - Tip and Oh use Slushious as an inter-planetary taxi but Tip takes it too far; Smek becomes homeless and must accept Oh's help.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep23
programme.desc: Chet Vs Dr. Disorder / Damselfly In Distress - Chet becomes obsessed with tracking down a litterbug who is messing up the clean streets of Turbotown. // The FAST crew must compete against each other as they run a dangerous obstacle course race to save a damselfly princess who is being held captive.

programme.title: Dinotrux Ep23
programme.desc: Lightning - When Skrap-It gets struck by lightning, he's suddenly smart and comes up with a plan for D-Structs to remove the Dinotrux from the crater for good.on truck! Full-on fun! Watch giant Ty Rux, his little buddy Revvit and the crew come face-to-face with evil D-Structs.

programme.title: Where's Wally? Ep23
programme.desc: Riddle Me This, Egypt - Wally and Wenda accompany Wizard Dustybeard on his latest archaeology expedition: finding the Lost Chamber of Magic Keys. To find the hidden chamber, the Wanderers will have to solve the key's riddles. But Odlulu is on their tail, and when she takes the Riddle Key, the Wanderers must navigate a hidden pyramid full of tricks and traps.

programme.title: The Mighty Ones Ep1
programme.desc: Rocky's in a Hole Lotta Trouble/The Great Invisi-Barrier - When Rocksy sinks to the bottom of a giant pond, her friends must figure out how to rescue her... without Rocksy's help. / When an invisible force-a-wall (a pane of glass) descends upon the yard and separates the Mighty Ones, Rocksy must figure out how to penetrate it so the group can be re-united.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep122

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep155
programme.desc: Ron's Sunburn - Ron has gotten a terrible sunburn and is too embarrassed to come outside and play with his friends. They try everything they can think of to get him to play with them. They even try tempting him with Froga's freshly baked cookies!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep156
programme.desc: Bubu's Portrait - Anna is painting a beautiful portrait of Bubu as a surprise gift. As she is missing a colour, she leaves the painting in the meadow for a moment. Meanwhile, Christopher arrives and finds the abandoned painting, he decides to take it to Bubu's.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep309

programme.title: Deer Squad S02 Ep201

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S01 Ep102
programme.desc: Banana - Tiny Chef makes banana toast but after squishing his perfect banana, has to create a brand new dish!

programme.desc: Relay Tales / The Barbababies' World - Barbalib, Barbalala and Barbabelle take turns as narrators to tell a story, each one bringing a very personal touch to it. // The Barbapapa family spends a day at the beach. Divided into 2 teams, the barbababies fight over a sandy peninsula.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep158
programme.desc: Go Find it ! - Today, Christopher organises the game of the day. He lists objects that his friends must bring back, the 1st team who does, win the game. But the objects are not easy to gather: the sun, a rocket ship, or a house!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep169
programme.desc: The Key - Because of her fear of spiders, Froga locks herself and Ron in the greenhouse to collecting Strawberries for the friends' Strawberry Snack time Musical Feast. But when it is time to leave, she can't locate the key...

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep118
programme.desc: The Four-Leaf Clover - Anna and her friends have organized a hula hoop competition and Froga relies on her four-leaf clover to help her win! But when she loses it, Froga is convinced there is no way she'll ever win.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep119

programme.desc: Fixing Things - Bubu catches a cold, he's unable to fix Ron's spinning top and Christopher's broken piano. While Bubu is resting, she "fixes" the broken items for him. Christopher's piano starts playing bubbles, Froga realizes she should leave the fixing to Bubu

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep123

programme.desc: Bubble Trouble - Bubu's bubble maker invention works so well, it creates an enormous bubble that Christopher gets trapped in! He loves his journey soaring over the land - but his friends are desperate to rescue him!

programme.desc: Party Time - Anna and Froga want to throw a party..... since it is not a particular party day they decide to celebrate "Tomato Day", But Christopher ate all of the tomatoes ... so they need to find another name... Anna finds the perfect name: Friendship party!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep123
programme.desc: Prank Day - Today is Prank day, Anna and her friends must compete to elect the best prankster of all. Everyone's doing a great except Christopher. The friends are surprised when the worst prankster turns out to be the best!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep609
programme.desc: Night Animals - It's night time at Grandpa and Granny Pig's house, and Peppa and George have stayed up late to help hunt for slugs and snails.

programme.desc: The Secret Club - Suzy and Peppa start a Secret Agent Club – going on secret missions, and doing secret things. In secret. But soon everyone wants to join!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep145

programme.desc: Bo Bo Business / Blunder Party - Ronnie Anne and Sid are pumped up for their sleepover, but Carl and Adelaide might ruin the day! // After a disagreement with Abuelo, Bobby goes to work for Mr. Hong to try out his new business ideas.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S01 Ep119
programme.desc: Cursed! - Celebrity psychic Ernesto Estrella deems Great Lakes City to be bad luck and Abuela believes him!

programme.title: The Twisted Timeline of Sammy and Raj S01 Ep109
programme.desc: Bad Business / Anniversorry - Sammy are Hugo are running for Junior Business Club President, but when the votes come in they are tied...// Dada and Dadi's anniversary party is at the same time as arcade night! Can the boys find a way to be in two places at once?

programme.title: Middlemost Post S01 Ep111
programme.desc: Ariel Force One / Itsy Bitsy - When a hot air balloonist crash lands into the Steadfast, the Middlemost Post goes on a journey to help her fix it. // When Parker gives shelter to a spider during a blizzard on the mountain, the cloud learns of Angus's deathly spider fear.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S05 Ep502
programme.desc: Unboxing Day - Alvin's attempts to make money as an internet influencer almost drives a local toy store out of business.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S05 Ep502
programme.desc: Dave's Pavilion - When the Chipmunks accidently ruin Dave's new pavilion, they allow Miss Miller to take the fall.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S05 Ep503
programme.desc: U-Fly - Alvin's too short to ride an exhilarating new amusement park ride, so he devises a plan to sneak on afterhours.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S07 Ep136
programme.desc: A Day Without Tears / Summer Job - Squidward bets SpongeBob he can't go a day without crying. // Mrs. Puff has to work through her summer break at the Krusty Krab.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S10 Ep214
programme.desc: Patrick's Coupon / Out of the Picture - Patrick has a coupon for free ice cream, but he'll have to get to the store if he wants to use it! // Krabs buys Squidward's art, but to make a profit on his purchase he'll have to get the artist out of the picture!

programme.title: The Casagrandes S01 Ep108
programme.desc: Flee Market / Copy Can't - Bobby struggles to give up control of the mercado during his pizza-versary date with Lori. // When Ronnie Anne notices that she's the only person Carlitos won't copy, she's determined to change it!

programme.title: The Casagrandes S02 Ep220
programme.desc: Strife Coach / Gossip Girl - Ronnie Anne and her friends help get Mrs. Kernicky hired as the new PE coach, but her classes are no joke! // When a Sid secret is leaked at school, Ronnie Anne and Sid wonder if they can continue being best buds!

programme.title: The Loud House S06 Ep605
programme.desc: The Taunting Hour / Musical Chairs - After Lincoln tries to help Lynn get over a heckler at her soccer game, the Louds realize they all have critics. // Lincoln convinces his teacher, Mr. Bolhofner, to join the Doo-Dads in order to get a better seat in class.

programme.title: The Loud House S06 Ep606
programme.desc: A Bug's Strife / All the Rage - Dad tears the house apart trying to find the cricket ruining his peaceful day alone in the house. // Tired of getting pummeled during dodgeball, Lincoln and the gang use Clyde's untapped rage without him knowing.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S01 Ep15
programme.desc: Sleepy Time / Suds - SpongeBob suddenly posses the ability to visit the dreams of his friends. // SpongeBob comes down with a case of the Suds, an illness which turns him into a bubble-maker.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S08 Ep177
programme.desc: The Good Krabby Name / Move It or Lose It - Mr. Krabs wants all of Bikini Bottom to eat at the Krusty Krab, so SpongeBob and Patrick go on an advertising blitz. // Mr. Krabs and Plankton circulate petitions to see which restaurant will get bulldozed by the city.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S09 Ep197
programme.desc: Mall Girl Pearl / Two Thumbs Down - Pearl gets a job to be cool like her friends, but the only store that’s hiring is the lamest store at the mall! // SpongeBob loses the use of his thumbs, and must get them back in working order before his entire life falls apart.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S09 Ep198
programme.desc: Sharks vs. Pods / CopyBob DittoPants - 'The Sharks' are the toughest guys in town, but their next confrontation might be too much for SpongeBob to handle. // Plankton clones SpongeBob in an effort to steal Krabs’ secret formula, but original Bob might ruin his plans.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S02 Ep213
programme.desc: Battle of the Grandpas / Prankaversary - When Frida's fun dad comes to visit, Hector tries to win back his grandchildren's attention. // Ronnie Anne and Lincoln are set for a big day of pranks and newbie Sid wants to join in on the fun too!

programme.title: The Casagrandes S02 Ep214
programme.desc: Zoo-mergency! - After a zoo fundraiser goes wrong, Sid must save the day with her family!

programme.title: The Casagrandes S02 Ep215
programme.desc: Just Be Coo / Tee'd Off - When Sancho gets himself into trouble in the city, Sergio helps him become a model pet! // Worried that Lori may have a new crush, Bobby visits her in college and tries to impress her with his golf skills.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S01 Ep12
programme.desc: The Chaperone / Employee of the Month - When Mr. Krab's daughter Pearl is stood up, SpongeBob agrees to step in. // Mr. Krabs dupes SpongeBob into believing he might break his winning streak and lose to Squidward.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S01 Ep14
programme.desc: SpongeBob 129 / Karate Choppers - Fleeing from SpongeBob and Patrick's consistent noise, Squidward winds up frozen. // SpongeBob and Sandy's incessant Karate sparring is starting to wreak havoc in the Krusty Krab.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S01 Ep15
programme.desc: Sleepy Time / Suds - SpongeBob suddenly posses the ability to visit the dreams of his friends. // SpongeBob comes down with a case of the Suds, an illness which turns him into a bubble-maker.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S01 Ep17
programme.desc: Arrgh! / Rock Bottom - A pretend search for gold turns into a real treasure hunt. // SpongeBob gets on the wrong bus and finds himself lost in a mysterious part of the sea.

programme.title: Middlemost Post S02 Ep205
programme.desc: Sporty Parker / Hammy Time - Parker makes the Yellow Springs soccer team, which thrills Angus since he never had the chance to play growing up. // Parker brings home a hamster the Middlemost Post falls in love with, but this love quickly turns to jealousy.

programme.title: Middlemost Post S01 Ep109
programme.desc: Out of Shape - Jelly. Parker becomes overly obsessed with a game to the point where the little nimbus isn't a cloud anymore.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness S01 Ep126
programme.desc: Has-been Hero - Po's Kung Fu hero, Kwan the Unkillable, comes to the Valley of Peace and appears to be a feeble old man. Po agrees to stage a fight to help him get back on top. But Kwan may not be as weak as he looks.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness S02 Ep201
programme.desc: Kung Fu Day Care - Tigress is forced to babysit a small child who has been separated from his parents.

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender S02 Ep213
programme.desc: The Drill - Aang discovers a secret Fire Nation super weapon heading straight for Ba Sing Se and must stop it before it destroys the great wall that protects the city from invasion.

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar S01 Ep120
programme.desc: Truth Ache - Private accidentally drinks Kowalski's truth serum and starts spilling the penguin's secrets to the rest of the zoo.

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar S02 Ep208
programme.desc: Wishful Thinking / April Fools - The penguins are on a mission to fulfill wishes. Private tells Mort that if he throws a penny in the fountain his wish will come true. // King Julien has just discovered April Fools Day. Making up for lost time, he terrorizes the zoo with pranks.

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar S02 Ep209
programme.desc: Hello, Dollface / Fit to Print - The toy manufacturer of Rico's doll-girlfriend has upgraded their doll line with a voice chip. // When the penguins are photographed while in action and placed on the new zoo poster they have to stop the presses before the poster gets out.

programme.title: Breadwinners S01 Ep116
programme.desc: Pizzawinners / Yeasterday - SwaySway and Buhdeuce meet their match when two punker cranes start delivering pizza on their turf. // Buhdeuce has a bad day, so he eats Yeasterday Bread, reliving the same day over and over with bad results for SwaySway.

programme.title: The Barbarian and the Troll S01 Ep107
programme.desc: When Dragons Cry - To get the dragon's tears needed for Axe, the group must first visit a magical marketplace, where Stacey's meeting with a witch finally reveals Brendar's complicated backstory.

programme.title: Dorg Van Dango S01 Ep112

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Yan vs. Dvalishvili
programme.desc: Prelims - A relentless force meets an immovable tank on March 11 when former bantamweight champion Petr “No Mercy” Yan faces Merab “The Machine” Dvalishvili in a highly anticipatedUFC Fight Night main event at The Theater at Virgin Hotels in Las Vegas. On the road to regaining his 135-pound crown, Yan’s resume includes knockouts of Urijah Faber and Jose Aldo, and he plans on adding Dvalishvili’s name to that list, but with eight consecutive wins and an aggressive attack that has seen him defeat Aldo, Marlon Moraes and Cody Stamann, “The Machine” is no one’s stepping stone

programme.title: Shark Grand Prix de France Highlights
programme.desc: Highlights - Built in 1965 around the existing 24-Hour track, the Le Mans Bugatti Grand Prix race circuit lies 5km south of the city of Le Mans and 200km south-west of Paris. The venue has hosted Grand Prix since the late sixties but a serious accident to Spanish rider Alberto Puig in 1995 saw it struck off the calendar until 2000 whilst stringent safety improvements were carried out. Le Mans is a tight track dominated by first gear corners that place the emphasis on late braking and hard acceleration, whilst rear end traction is also a key area. With the capacity to comfortably accommodate up to 100,000 spectators, the Bugatti circuit also plays host to the 24 hour truck race, the FIA GP2 Championship, French Touring Car and GT races.

programme.title: 2023 All Elite Wrestling Rampage Ep2302
programme.desc: All Elite Wrestling is a one-hour primetime show. The world's most popular wrestlers perform in one of the most anticipated shows, attracting a passionate fan base and creating a streamlined viewing experience that gives viewers the best seat in the house at home.

programme.title: UFC 286: Edwards vs. Usman 3
programme.desc: Prelims - One of the welterweight division’s longest standing rivalries comes to a close in the main event of UFC 286 at the O2 Arena in London when England’s own Leon Edwards defends his crown against former champion Kamaru Usman in a rubber match the entire sports world will be watching. Fresh from a stunning knockout of Usman last August that evened their series at 1-1, Birmingham’s Edwards will now make his first title defense against “The Nigerian Nightmare,” who has won 19 of his last 20 bouts. Plus, two of the lightweight division’s most explosive contenders collide, as Justin Gaethje meets Rafael Fiziev in the UFC 286 co-main event
